templates.name: 01-Desafio PAIS Y AMENAZA
templates.description: Muestra Desafio si no es de ARG USA o CAN
templates.expression: ((cf.threat_score gt 10) or not (ip.geoip.country in { "AR" "US" "CA" }) )  and not (ip.src in $whitelist_ip) and not (http.user_agent contains "letsencrypt")

templates.name: 02-Bloqueo Control de Crawlers
templates.description: No permite a los Bots acceder a paginas o carpetas privadas
templates.expression:
(
 (cf.client.bot and 
  (http.request.uri.query contains "p=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "dir=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "order=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "mode=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "limit=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "cat=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "SID=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "criterion=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "color=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "size=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "price=" or
   http.request.uri.query contains "brand="))
)
or
(
  http.user_agent contains "Scrapy" or
  http.user_agent contains "seranking" or
  http.user_agent contains "Bytespider" or
  http.user_agent contains "GeedoProductSearch" or
  http.user_agent contains "opensiteexplorer" or
  http.user_agent contains "BLEXBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Barkrowler" or
  http.user_agent contains "GPTBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Amazonbot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Yandex" or
  http.user_agent contains "Semrush" or
  http.user_agent contains "AhrefsBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "claude" or
  http.user_agent contains "CCBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "ChatGPT-User" or
  http.user_agent contains "YouBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Google-Extended" or
  http.user_agent contains "Applebot-Extended" or
  http.user_agent contains "anthropic-ai" or
  http.user_agent contains "ClaudeBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Omgilibot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Omgili" or
  http.user_agent contains "FacebookBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Diffbot" or
  http.user_agent contains "ImagesiftBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "PerplexityBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "cohere-ai" or
  http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalAgent" or
  http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalFetcher" or
  http.user_agent contains "Timpibot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Webzio-Extended"
)

templates.name: 03-Bloqueo por Pais y Agente
templates.description: Bloque si no es de America o Europa Occidental o si es Agente sospechoso
templates.expression:
(
   (
      (http.user_agent contains "Scrapy")
      or (http.user_agent contains "seranking")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Bytespider")
      or (http.user_agent contains "GeedoProductSearch")
      or (http.user_agent contains "opensiteexplorer")
      or (http.user_agent contains "BLEXBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Barkrowler")
      or (http.user_agent contains "GPTBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Amazonbot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Yandex")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Semrush")
      or (http.user_agent contains "AhrefsBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "claude")
      or (http.user_agent contains "CCBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "ChatGPT-User")
      or (http.user_agent contains "YouBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Google-Extended")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Applebot-Extended")
      or (http.user_agent contains "anthropic-ai")
      or (http.user_agent contains "ClaudeBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Omgilibot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Omgili")
      or (http.user_agent contains "FacebookBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Diffbot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "ImagesiftBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "PerplexityBot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "cohere-ai")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalAgent")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalFetcher")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Timpibot")
      or (http.user_agent contains "Webzio-Extended")
      or not (
         ip.geoip.country in {
            "AR" "BO" "BR" "CL" "CO" "CR" "CU" "DO" "EC" "GT" "GY" "HN" "HT" "JM" "MX" "NI" "PA" "PE" "PY" "SR" "SV" "TT" "UY" "VE"
            "CA" "US" "AD" "AT" "BE" "CH" "DE" "DK" "ES" "FI" "FR" "GB" "GI" "GR" "IE" "IS" "IT" "LI" "LU" "MC" "MT" "NL" "NO" "PT" "SE" "UK" "BR"
         }
      )
   )
   and not (ip.src in $whitelist_ip)
   and not (http.user_agent contains "letsencrypt")
)
